TopicTitle: Can't maintain stabilty in Realism Overhaul!

Articles.Content:
Tried about 30 times to launch a vessel and I can't make it past 3km, it ends up tilting and screwing the whole flight.

I have real solar system with all the mods included in the Realism Overhaul pack. Please help!!
Spin stabilize it, some Basic Fins scaled to 50% and tilted 5* are great, even better with a Tiny Tim booster as a first stage then the Aerobee.
